questions.question: How many people are dead and injured?
Were there any acts of bravery or any rescues?
How many fire engines and firefighters involved?
Sources:
questions.description: Fire chief, police, rescue services, hospital, mortuary, welfare agencies

questions.question: What is the identification of victims?
questions.description: Names, ages, addresses, other personal information.

questions.question: Where was the fire and what was burning (a building, house, field, etc.)?
When did the fire start, where and how did it spread?
When and after how long was it brought under control?
How were victims killed and injured and what is the extent of the injuries?
Property loss:
questions.description: what is the extent, cost of damage, insurance? You may need to phone an expert.

questions.question: Where were the injured and dead taken?
Contact details of people you've interviewed
